verses.verse: <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1696>"Speak<s%> to <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> and <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H5927>him,<s%> 'When you light the <S%H5216>lamps,<s%> the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H5216>lamps<s%> shall give <S%H215>light<s%> in <S%H6440>front<s%> of the <S%H4501>lampstand.<s%>'"

<S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H5927>so.<s%> He lit its <S%H5216>lamps<s%> to light the area in <S%H4136>front<s%> of the <S%H4501>lampstand,<s%> as <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

This was the workmanship of the <S%H4501>lampstand,<s%> <S%H4749>beaten<s%> <S%H4639>work<s%> of <S%H2091>gold.<s%> From its <S%H3409>base<s%> to its <S%H6525>flowers,<s%> it was beaten <S%H4749>work:<s%> according to the <S%H4758>pattern<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> had <S%H7200>shown<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> so he <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H4501>lampstand.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>
<S%H3947>"Take<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> from <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and cleanse <S%H2891>them.<s%>

You shall <S%H6213>do<s%> this to <S%H2891>them,<s%> to cleanse <S%H5137>them:<s%> sprinkle the <S%H4325>water<s%> of <S%H2403>cleansing<s%> on <S%H8593>them,<s%> let them shave their whole <S%H1320>bodies<s%> with a <S%H3526>razor,<s%> and let them wash their <S%H899>clothes,<s%> and cleanse <S%H2891>themselves.<s%>

Then let them <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H6499>bull,<s%> and its meal <S%H4503>offering,<s%> fine <S%H5560>flour<s%> <S%H1101>mixed<s%> with <S%H8081>oil;<s%> and <S%H8145>another<s%> <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H6499>bull<s%> you shall <S%H3947>take<s%> for a sin <S%H2403>offering.<s%>

You shall <S%H7126>present<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting.<s%> You shall <S%H6950>assemble<s%> the <S%H6950>whole<s%> <S%H4150>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

You shall <S%H7126>present<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall <S%H5564>lay<s%> their <S%H3027>hands<s%> on the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%>

and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> shall <S%H5130>offer<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> for a wave <S%H8573>offering,<s%> on the behalf of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> that it may be theirs to <S%H5647>do<s%> the <S%H5656>service<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

"The <S%H3881>Levites<s%> shall <S%H5564>lay<s%> their <S%H3027>hands<s%> on the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H6499>bulls,<s%> and you shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> the <S%H259>one<s%> for a sin <S%H2403>offering,<s%> and the <S%H259>other<s%> for a burnt <S%H2403>offering<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> to make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for the <S%H3881>Levites.<s%>

You shall <S%H5975>set<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> and <S%H6440>before<s%> his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and <S%H5130>offer<s%> them as a wave <S%H8573>offering<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
Thus you shall <S%H914>separate<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> from <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and the Levites shall be <S%H3881>mine.<s%>

<S%H310>"After<s%> <S%H3881>that,<s%> the Levites shall go <S%H935>in<s%> to do the <S%H5647>service<s%> of the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting:<s%> and you shall <S%H2891>cleanse<s%> <S%H5130>them,<s%> and offer them as a wave <S%H8573>offering.<s%>

For they are wholly <S%H5414>given<s%> to me from <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> instead of all who <S%H6363>open<s%> the <S%H7358>womb,<s%> even the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of all the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> I have taken them to <S%H3947>me.<s%>

For all the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> among the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> are <S%H120>mine,<s%> both man and <S%H929>animal.<s%> On the <S%H3117>day<s%> that I <S%H5221>struck<s%> all the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> I sanctified them for <S%H6942>myself.<s%>
I have <S%H3947>taken<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> instead of all the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> among the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

I have <S%H5414>given<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> as a <S%H5414>gift<s%> to <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and to his <S%H1121>sons<s%> from <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> to <S%H5647>do<s%> the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting,<s%> and to make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> that there be no <S%H5063>plague<s%> among the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> when the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> come <S%H5066>near<s%> to the <S%H6944>sanctuary.<s%>"

<S%H4872>Moses,<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> and all the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> so to the <S%H3881>Levites.<s%> According to all that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> concerning the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> so the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> did to <S%H6213>them.<s%>

The <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H2398>purified<s%> themselves from <S%H3526>sin,<s%> and they washed their <S%H899>clothes;<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H5130>offered<s%> them for a wave <S%H8573>offering<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> made <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for them to cleanse <S%H2891>them.<s%>

<S%H310>After<s%> <S%H3881>that,<s%> the Levites <S%H935>went<s%> in to <S%H5647>do<s%> their <S%H5656>service<s%> in the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> and <S%H6440>before<s%> his <S%H1121>sons:<s%> as <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> concerning the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> so they did to <S%H6213>them.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

"This is that which belongs to the <S%H3881>Levites:<s%> from <S%H6242>twenty<s%> - <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward<s%> they shall go <S%H935>in<s%> to <S%H6633>wait<s%> on the <S%H5656>service<s%> in the work of the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting;<s%>
and from the <S%H1121>age<s%> of <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> they shall <S%H7725>cease<s%> <S%H6635>waiting<s%> on the <S%H5656>work,<s%> and shall serve no <S%H5647>more,<s%>

but shall <S%H8334>minister<s%> with their <S%H251>brothers<s%> in the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting,<s%> to <S%H8104>perform<s%> the <S%H4931>duty,<s%> and shall <S%H5647>do<s%> no <S%H5656>service.<s%> You shall <S%H5647>do<s%> thus to the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> concerning their <S%H4931>duties.<s%>"
